nodes.id: 中央地方共建国家级博物馆

zh-cn: 中央地方共建国家级博物馆

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国国家文物局和财政部共同认定，中央和省级人民政府联合共建的一批地方所属重点博物馆。
description.en: A group of key local museums in the People's Republic of China, jointly designated by the National Cultural Heritage Administration and the Ministry of Finance, and co-constructed by the central and provincial governments.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责文物和博物馆事业的政府机构。
description.en: The government agency of the People's Republic of China responsible for cultural relics and museum affairs.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国财政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责国家财政收支、财税政策等工作的宏观调控部门。
description.en: The macro-control department of the People's Republic of China responsible for national fiscal revenue and expenditure, fiscal and taxation policies.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族在历史上所创造的物质文明与精神文明的总和。
description.en: The sum of the material and spiritual civilizations created by the Chinese nation throughout history.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海市的大型中国古代艺术博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A large museum of ancient Chinese art located in Shanghai, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于江苏省南京市的大型综合性历史与艺术类博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A large comprehensive museum of history and art located in Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南省长沙市的大型历史艺术类博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A large museum of history and art located in Changsha, Hunan Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于河南省郑州市的综合性博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A comprehensive museum located in Zhengzhou, Henan Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于陕西省西安市的大型现代化国家级博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A large modern national-level museum located in Xi'an, Shaanxi Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖北省武汉市的综合性博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A comprehensive museum located in Wuhan, Hubei Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于辽宁省沈阳市的大型综合性博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A large comprehensive museum located in Shenyang, Liaoning Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于浙江省杭州市的综合性人文科学博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A comprehensive museum of humanities and sciences located in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于重庆市的综合性博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A comprehensive museum located in Chongqing, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

zh-cn: 首都博物馆（大运河博物馆）

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的大型综合性博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A large comprehensive museum located in Beijing, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于山西省太原市的综合性博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A comprehensive museum located in Taiyuan, Shanxi Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于河北省石家庄市的省级综合性博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A provincial comprehensive museum located in Shijiazhuang, Hebei Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于山东省济南市的省级综合性博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A provincial comprehensive museum located in Jinan, Shandong Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于广东省广州市的省级综合性博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A provincial comprehensive museum located in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

description.zh-cn: 位于四川省成都市的省级综合性博物馆，是中央地方共建国家级博物馆之一。
description.en: A provincial comprehensive museum located in Chengdu, Sichuan Province, one of the national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.

relationships.target: 中央地方共建国家级博物馆

description.zh-cn: 国家文物局与财政部共同认定并发布了中央地方共建国家级博物馆名单，启动了该项目。
description.en: The National Cultural Heritage Administration and the Ministry of Finance jointly designated and released the list of national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments, launching the program.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国财政部
relationships.target: 中央地方共建国家级博物馆

description.zh-cn: 财政部与国家文物局共同认定并发布了中央地方共建国家级博物馆名单，启动了该项目。
description.en: The Ministry of Finance and the National Cultural Heritage Administration jointly designated and released the list of national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments, launching the program.

relationships.target: 中央地方共建国家级博物馆

description.zh-cn: 中央地方共建国家级博物馆项目旨在选取能代表中华文明的地方重点博物馆进行共建。
description.en: The program for national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments aims to select and co-develop key local museums that represent Chinese civilization.

relationships.target: 中央地方共建国家级博物馆

description.zh-cn: 首批入选中央地方共建国家级博物馆名单。
description.en: Selected in the first batch of the list of national-level museums jointly built by central and local governments.
